nodes.name: AdaptiveStakingPolicy

attributes.name: AdaptiveStakingPolicy

userdoc.notice: A staking policy which allows the grantee to always stake a certain multiple of the defined minimum stake, or the unlocked amount at a specified time in the future, if it is greater.  /// When creating a policy, the minimum stake multiplier and stakeahead time can be customized, and whether the cliff is considered in the stakeahead can also be chosen.
